based on the api summary provided, the main functionality and purpose of the api is to provide personalized financial advice to individuals and households. the api uses a heuristics-based algorithm to divide the target savings for a year into different investment and savings options such as 401k, emergency savings account, debt repayment, etc. the api is capable of generating household-based advice catering to partner's retirement accounts, investments, etc. the api can also provide for a customized investment logic through configuration details. the algorithm works on a step-wise logic resembling a waterfall distribution of target saving amount. these steps can be reordered, included/excluded using configuration details. therefore, the category for this api is "banking".
